Color codes¶

Prism leds are used to signal all differents mode of function and error codes. Here is all the possible color codes available.

For simpler search thorugth all codes select first the button’s color:

Note

“Can’t find your color? Try this section for other color codes”

Button green¶

Color

Name

Description

EV charging:

EV charging from the main power

Overheating

Overheating, EV charge current limited

Overcurrent

Current above the set value (<10%) but under maximum limit.

EV charging continue.

Button red¶

Color

Name

Description

Overheat

Temperature above limit, waiting for cooling

EV error

EV not recognized, charging not available

Overcurrent

Current above the set value (>10%) or above maximum limit.

EV charging stops.

Current leakage

Current leakage, charging not allowed for safety reasons

Relay stucking

Relay unable to open

Warning

disconnect EV and avoid usage. Further intervention required.

Voltage error

Voltage drop too high, wires too thin

RCD test error

RCD test failed

Overvoltage

Voltage above maximum limit

Internal error

EEPROM error

Button yellow¶

Color

Name

Description

Solar charging

Charging with some power coming from PV panels.

The yellow leds indicate the amount of power coming from solar, each led corresponds to 20% of the total power

Note

In this figure the amount of power coming from solar is 60% (3 yellow leds)

Button purple¶

Color

Name

Description

Update

Update in progress.

Device will reset when updating is completed

Button light blue¶

Color

Name

Description

Standby

Prism in standby, ready for charging

Others¶

Color

Name

Description

No internet

No internet connection. User input available only from front panel

Note

only last led is purple, the other leds behave normally
